message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we do $12,500? That's the best I can do.
